title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Grupo Tress Internacional's .NET modernization with AWS Transform (MAM320)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Grupo Tress Internacional 使用 AWS Transform 进行 .NET 现代化改造 (MAM320)
abstract: Looking to modernize your .NET applications? Learn how Grupo Tress Internacional used AWS Transform to reduce modernization effort by 70% while migrating from .NET Framework to .NET 8. This session demonstrates practical strategies for containerization and serverless using Amazon ECS, AWS Fargate and AWS Lambda, implementing DevOps methodologies, and empowering developers with generative AI tools to accelerate innovation.
abstract_cn: 希望实现 .NET 应用程序现代化？了解 Grupo Tress Internacional 如何使用 AWS Transform 将现代化工作量减少 70%，同时从 .NET Framework 迁移到 .NET 8。本次会议演示了使用 Amazon ECS、AWS Fargate 和 AWS Lambda 进行容器化和无服务器化的实用策略，实施 DevOps 方法论，并通过生成式 AI 工具赋能开发人员加速创新。
